20110114024022.000|20110114024025.000|CC1|INTO THE AUSTRALIAN ICKE, IF YOU
20110114024025.000|20110114024028.000|CC1|LIKE -- PSYCHE.                 
20110114024028.000|20110114024029.000|CC1|BUT DEALING WITH THAT LOSS OF   
20110114024029.000|20110114024031.000|CC1|LIFE WILL TEST THAT RESILIENCE  
20110114024031.000|20110114024032.000|CC1|TO THE LIMIT.                   
20110114024032.000|20110114024035.000|CC1|>> SRI LANKA HAS ALSO BEEN HIT
